recipes.label: Hint: A Revealing Performance: Not Enough!
recipes.startdescription: There is something here, but I cannot quite reach it. If I could stage a performance with a stronger tie to Lantern.

recipes.previewdescription: I can start with soaring notes, clear as bells, clear as a summer sky. It would be a reveleation upon my audience, as well as to any further subjects.
recipes.label: Perform a Show laced with the Intent of Lantern
recipes.startdescription: My eyes are closed now, but the bright stage lights burn through as if they are diaphenous. I feel as if I am wholy clear, only an image of light and music.
Now comes the time for me to channel this energy into whatever target I desire.

slots.label: Direction
slots.description: Now that my Intent is set, I have to set my Direction. What do I wish to affect?

recipes.label: The Ballad to Sunset Cealia
recipes.startdescription:
Caelia, my great mystery
Do you enjoy the way you're chased by me
Is that why I glimpse your glances
At the fêtes and at the dances

Caelia I know what is said of you
You’re a player and a dreamer too
In the moonlight you will lead us on
But every time by sunrise you are gone

recipes.label: The Ballad to Sunset Cealia
recipes.startdescription:
Caelia please enlighten me
Only with you am I truly free
Lift this veil that clouds my being
Only in your eyes I'm truly seeing

Caelia’s can’t you hear I'm blue
I even wrote this song for you
